doc.title: Countdown Continued
doc.plot: If you thought the first Countdown was wild, you won't belive what goes on in Countdown Continued, another great pair of twisted tales based upon the hit graphic series from Hiroyuki Utatane! In the first installment, a nervous young bride to be has a last minute fling...in the back of the chapel waiting room with another woman! Next a Samurai Policewoman and her sexually challanged giant robot must take on a giant walking statue controlled by a sexcrazed megalomaniac!
